story.text: Reuters publishes a Western European company diary covering earnings, shareholder meetings, news conferences and analyst meetings. Double-click on [WEU/EQUITY] or type in the code and hit F9. For daily West-European IPO diary, double-click on [WEU/IPO]. This diary is updated daily. Please note: - All events/times provisional and in local time unless otherwise indicated. - The inclusion of an event does not necessarily mean that Reuters will file a story based on it. ------------------------------------------------------------ MEDIAN DATE GMT/LOCAL INDICATOR PERIOD F/CAST PRIOR ------------------------------------------------------------ 19Jan 1400/1500 Consumer confidence Jan -8 24Jan 1400/1500 Business confidence Jan 2.5 30Jan 1030/1130 CPI Jan ------------------------------------------------------------ ----------------------Monday, January 8, 2007-------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - Van de Velde (VELD.BR) 2006 trading update ------------------------------------------------------------ --------------------Wednesday, January 10, 2007-------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - Kinepolis (KIPO.BR) 2006 visitor figures ------------------------------------------------------------ --------------------Thursday, January 11, 2007-------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - Deceuninck DECBt.BR 2006 trading update ------------------------------------------------------------ ---------------------Friday, January 12, 2007-------------- ECONOMY LUXEMBOURG - 1500 - "Structural reforms in Europe: Harmonisation or Decentralisation" with ECB Governing Council members Yves Mersch, Nicholas Garganas and Guy Quaden. ------------------------------------------------------------ --------------------Monday, January 15, 2007---------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - Brantano BRAN.BR 2006 sales BRUSSELS - 0800 - D'Ieteren (IETB.BR) trading update ------------------------------------------------------------ ------------------Thursday, January 18, 2007---------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - Delhaize DELBt.BR 2006 sales NAZARETH - Omega Pharma OMEP.BR fourth-quarter sales ------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------Tuesday, January 23, 2007---------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - Euronav (EUAV.BR) preliminary 2006 results ------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------Thursday, January 25, 2007---------------- EQUITIES BRUSSELS - CMB CMBBte.BR fourth-quarter results BRUSSELS - Exmar (EXMR.BR) provisional 2006 results ------------------------------------------------------------ ------------------------------------------------------------) FOR MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE DOUBLE-CLICK ON THE FOLLOWING CODES: [BE/DIARY] for the daily Belgian and Luxembourg diary [PRESS/BE] for today's Belgian press digest
story.title: diary - belgium to jan 31 , 2006
